properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 3:50PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in
low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways.

* WHERE...Sound side areas areas adjacent to the Albemarle,
Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal
creeks.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is
possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways
resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low
lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes
adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
flooded. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
